import React, { useState } from 'react'; const Invoices = () => { const [invoices, setInvoices] = useState([ { id: 1, invoiceNumber: 'INV-001', orderNumber: 'ORD-001', amount: 50000, dueDate: '2024-05-13', status: 'Ожидает оплаты', paymentMethod: 'Банковский перевод' }, { id: 2, invoiceNumber: 'INV-002', orderNumber: 'ORD-002', amount: 75000, dueDate: '2024-05-13', status: 'Оплачен', paymentMethod: 'Блокчейн' } ]); const getStatusColor = (status) => { switch (status) { case 'Ожидает оплаты': return 'bg-yellow-100 text-yellow-800'; case 'Оплачен': return 'bg-green-100 text-green-800'; case 'Просрочен': return 'bg-red-100 text-red-800'; default: return 'bg-gray-100 text-gray-800'; } }; return (

{invoice.invoiceNumber} {invoice.orderNumber} {invoice.amount} ₸ {invoice.dueDate} {invoice.status} {invoice.paymentMethod}
); }; export default Invoices;
